item.title: 穆迪称南非预算案"证实"强劲财政立场
item.description: 穆迪评级指出，南非最新预算报告描绘了公共财政改善的积极图景，同时警告称实现"实质性"债务削减需要更强劲的经济增长。【原文：South Africa’s latest budget painted an encouraging picture of improving public finances, according to Moody’s Ratings, while cautioning that “meaningful” debt reduction will require stronger economic growth.】

item.title: KKR向银行出售持股价值31亿美元的后交易公司OSTTRA
item.description: KKR & Co.将其旗下交易后服务提供商OSTTRA的少数股权出售给六家银行，这是金融市场基础设施公司最新的一笔此类交易。【原文：KKR & Co. sold a minority stake in its post-trade services provider OSTTRA to six banks, in the latest such deal for a financial-market infrastructure firm.】

item.title: 奥地利第一银行称波兰交易后利息收入将超110亿欧元
item.description: 奥地利第一集团银行表示，在以70亿欧元（83亿美元）收购波兰市场业务后，其今年净利息收入可能超出分析师预期。【原文：Erste Group Bank AG said its net interest income may exceed analyst expectations this year after its €7 billion ($8.3 billion) deal to enter the Polish market.】

item.title: 印度坚持不进口俄罗斯石油，特朗普关税政策存疑
item.description: 印度炼油商正将俄罗斯原油采购量控制在最低水平，此前美国最高法院上周末的裁决使一项备受期待的贸易协议前景蒙上阴影——该协议原本拟以停止进口俄罗斯原油为条件降低关税。【原文：Indian refiners are keeping Russian oil purchases to a minimum after a US Supreme Court ruling at the end of last week threw into question a long-awaited trade deal that would cut tariffs in exchange for halting those imports.】

item.title: OpenAI称ChatGPT拒绝协助中国影响力行动
item.description: OpenAI表示，其ChatGPT人工智能服务拒绝协助一名与中国执法部门有关联的个人策划网络抹黑日本首相的行动。【原文：OpenAI said its ChatGPT AI service refused to assist an individual associated with Chinese law enforcement in planning an online campaign to discredit the Japanese prime minister.】

item.title: 德拉克斯集团在加拿大和英国的生物质项目受挫，利润下滑
item.description: 德拉克斯集团全年利润大幅下滑，因其对加拿大生物质颗粒业务及英国碳捕获项目计提了减值准备。【原文：Drax Group Plc full year profits slumped as it booked impairments on its Canadian biomass pellets business and UK carbon capture project.】

item.title: 数据中心风险暴露成为建筑企业的救命稻草
item.description: 欧洲建筑和建材企业正面临低迷的住房市场和疲软的工业活动，因此正转向当前唯一蓬勃发展的领域：数据中心。【原文：Construction and building materials companies in Europe dealing with a struggling housing market and weak industrial activity are pivoting to the one area that is booming right now: data centers.】

item.title: 伦敦金融交易所集团宣布斥资30亿英镑回购股份，埃利奥特基金正推动变革
item.description: 伦敦证券交易所集团宣布计划回购价值30亿英镑（约合41亿美元）的本公司股票。此前不到一个月，该公司刚披露全年业绩，而埃利奥特投资管理公司入股的消息也于同期曝光。【原文：The London Stock Exchange Group Plc has announced plans to buy back £3 billion ($4.1 billion) of its own shares, as it reported full year results less than a month after it emerged that Elliott Investment Management had taken a stake.】

item.title: 彪马预计将再创亏损纪录，取消股息派发
item.description: 彪马公司预测今年将再次亏损，并取消了股息派发。这家德国品牌正致力于清理滞销运动鞋和服装库存，为2027年重返盈利增长奠定基础。【原文：Puma SE forecast another loss this year and scrapped its dividend as the German brand looks to clear unsold sneakers and apparel and position itself for a return to profitable growth in 2027.】

item.title: 奥卡多因自动化仓库部署受阻将裁员
item.description: 英国在线杂货配送公司奥卡多集团（Ocado Group Plc）将裁减"大量"岗位，因其最大客户业务萎缩带来的冲击。【原文：Ocado Group Plc will make a “significant number” of job cuts as the British online grocery delivery company grapples with the impact of a pullback by its biggest customer.】

item.title: 腾讯据称正洽谈收购"Block Blast!"游戏工作室股权
item.description: 据知情人士透露，腾讯控股有限公司正洽谈收购Hungry Studio的部分股权。该游戏开发商曾推出热门作品《Block Blast!》。【原文：Tencent Holdings Ltd. is in talks to acquire a small stake in Hungry Studio, a gaming developer behind popular title Block Blast!, according to people familiar with the situation.】

item.title: 安盛集团布伯尔对私募信贷表示担忧，称风险敞口较低
item.description: 安盛集团首席执行官托马斯·布伯尔承认市场普遍担忧私人信贷领域，同时试图向投资者保证该公司在此类资产类别中的投资安全。【原文：Axa SA Chief Executive Officer Thomas Buberl acknowledged widespread worries about private credit while seeking to reassure investors about his firm’s investments in the asset class.】

item.title: 印度放宽3850亿美元股票基金规则，允许增持黄金
item.description: 印度市场监管机构已允许该国规模达3840亿美元的主动管理型股票基金增加黄金和白银配置，在全球实物资产需求上升之际赋予基金更大的灵活性。【原文：India’s market regulator has allowed the country’s $384 billion actively managed equity funds to park more of their money in gold and silver, giving them greater flexibility at a time when global demand for hard assets is rising.】

item.title: 劳斯莱斯计划大规模回购股票，上调中期目标
item.description: 劳斯莱斯控股公司宣布将在未来两年回购价值70亿至90亿英镑的公司股票，并上调中期盈利目标。这家英国制造商正借势大型飞机发动机及数据中心动力系统的需求激增。【原文：Rolls-Royce Holdings Plc said it will buy back between £7 billion to £9 billion in company stock over the next two years and raised its mid-term earnings targets as the UK-based manufacturer capitalizes on soaring demand for large aircraft engines and the power systems that drive data centers.】

item.title: WPP集团计划通过重组举措实现每年5亿英镑的成本节约
item.description: WPP集团计划到2028年实现每年5亿英镑（约合6.78亿美元）的成本节约目标，作为其全面重组计划的一部分。这家陷入困境的英国广告集团希望通过此举，助力公司在明年重回增长轨道。【原文：WPP Plc is targeting £500 million ($678 million) in annual cost savings by 2028 as part of a sweeping restructuring that the embattled British advertising group hopes will help it to return to growth next year.】

item.title: 罗马尼亚的“TikTok之王”真的左右了总统大选吗？
item.description:
当局称，一名公民通过赠送应用内礼物，花费近百万美元为亲俄候选人进行宣传。

【原文：

Authorities say a citizen spent almost a million dollars promoting a pro-Russia candidate by giving in-app gifts.

】

item.title: 迪拜航空将以70亿美元收购麦格理航空金融公司
item.description: 迪拜航空企业同意以约70亿美元的企业价值收购麦格理航空金融有限公司，此举使其机队规模扩大至1000余架，并进一步推动了喷气式飞机融资行业的整合进程。【原文：Dubai Aerospace Enterprise agreed to buy Macquarie AirFinance Ltd. for an enterprise value of about $7 billion, expanding its fleet of aircraft to more than 1,000 units and extending consolidation in the jet-financing industry.】

item.title: 印尼土地整治行动冲击云顶种植园利润
item.description: 印尼因涉嫌滥用土地问题对资源企业开出罚单，导致云顶种植有限公司最新季度收益受挫。这家在马来西亚上市的种植企业向特别工作组支付了约2500万美元罚款，该工作组正致力于重塑全球最大食用油生产国棕榈油产业格局。【原文：Indonesia’s drive to fine resource companies over alleged misuse of lands cut into Genting Plantations Bhd.’s earnings in the latest quarter, with the Malaysian-listed planter forking over about $25 million to a task force that is reshaping the palm sector in the world’s biggest producer of the edible oil.】

item.title: 富时100指数有望收于接近历史新高水平
索尼将股票回购计划延长至5月，规模增至16亿美元
item.description: 索尼集团公司正将其持续进行的股票回购计划扩大至最高2500亿日元（约合16亿美元），较此前公布的1000亿日元规模翻倍有余，此举旨在提升资本效率。【原文：Sony Group Corp. is expanding its ongoing share buyback program to as much as ¥250 billion ($1.6 billion), more than double its previously announced ¥100 billion, as part of a push to increase capital efficiency.】

item.title: 日本电产创始人永森长守卸任名誉董事长职务
item.description: 日本电产创始人永森重信将卸任名誉董事长职务。此前因会计丑闻引发信用评级下调、财务报告延迟，并使公司面临退市风险，他已辞去董事会职务。【原文：Nidec Corp. founder Shigenobu Nagamori is relinquishing his post as chairman emeritus, having already resigned from the board after an accounting scandal triggered credit downgrades, delayed financial results and put the company at risk of becoming delisted.】

item.title: 苹果正与银行洽谈，计划在印度推出支付服务
item.description: 苹果公司正与印度主要银行及全球信用卡网络展开磋商，为在世界人口最多的国家推出Apple Pay服务做准备。【原文：Apple Inc. is in discussions with key Indian banks and global card networks in preparation to start Apple Pay in the world’s most populous country.】

item.title: 泰国航空计划增购喷气式飞机并扩大亚洲业务，目标实现5%营收增长
item.description: 泰国国际航空公司预计今年收入将增长5%，该公司正通过新增飞机并拓展包括印度和中国在内的亚洲主要市场来实现这一目标。【原文：Thai Airways International Pcl expects revenue to grow 5% this year as it adds new aircraft and expands in key Asian markets, including India and China.】

item.title: 德国电信业绩超预期，得益于德美市场增长
item.description: 德国电信公司公布的2026年盈利预测超出分析师预期，这家欧洲最大电信运营商在本土市场及美国市场均实现了新增用户增长。【原文：Deutsche Telekom AG forecast 2026 earnings that beat analysts’ estimates as Europe’s biggest phone carrier adds new customers in its home market and the US.】

item.title: 据称印度国家证券交易所邀请银行竞标25亿美元印度IPO项目
item.description: 据知情人士透露，印度国家证券交易所有限公司已向投资银行发出招标邀请函，邀请其竞标参与该交易所备受期待的首次公开募股（IPO）相关业务。【原文：National Stock Exchange of India Ltd. has issued a request for proposals to investment banks, inviting them to pitch for roles on its long-awaited initial public offering, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 印度经济真的能与日本匹敌吗？
item.description: 多年来，印度一直位居世界第五大经济体，仅次于美国、中国、德国和日本。如今，凭借其14亿人口规模庞大且相对年轻的优势，加之日本经济以美元计价的规模持续萎缩，印度正逐步逼近日本。【原文：For years, India has ranked as the world’s fifth-largest economy, behind the US, China, Germany and Japan. Now it’s closing in on Japan, helped by its 1.4 billion-strong, relatively young population and by the shrinking size of Japan’s economy in dollar terms.】

item.title: 大豆期货维持高位，美国生物燃料政策决议临近
item.description: 大豆期货——从豆粕到豆油——在接近近期高位交易，因市场预期美国环保署即将公布生物燃料掺混配额。【原文：Soy futures — from beans to oil — traded near their recent highs ahead of the expected submission of biofuel blending quotas by the US Environmental Protection Agency.】

item.title: 日本出生人数连续十年下降，加剧人口压力
item.description: 2025年日本出生人数连续第十个年头下降，凸显出该国面临的人口压力。首相高市早苗正推行新措施以应对出生率下滑问题。【原文：Births in Japan fell for a 10th straight year in 2025 underscoring the demographic strain Japan faces as Prime Minister Sanae Takaichi pursues new measures to counter the decline.】

item.title: 首尔公寓价格涨幅趋缓，韩国央行维持利率不变
item.description: 首尔公寓价格连续第二周上涨，但涨幅放缓至逾五个月来最低水平，这缓解了韩国银行的压力——此前当局周四连续第六次维持政策利率不变。【原文：Seoul apartment prices extended their gains for another week, though the pace slowed to the weakest in more than five months, easing pressure on the Bank of Korea after authorities held the policy rate steady for a sixth consecutive meeting on Thursday.】

item.title: 香港交易所季度利润因交易量激增上涨15%
item.description: 香港交易所净利润增长15%，因大批中国企业争相上市，交易量激增。【原文：Hong Kong’s stock exchange posted a 15% gain in net income as a flood Chinese firms sought to sell shares and trading jumped.】
